io.elegie.luchess.web.launcher.services.impl

Class JettyServerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.web.launcher.services.impl.JettyServerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerService

    public class JettyServerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerService
    An implementation of the server service, backed by a Jetty 9 web server.

        public static final java.lang.String CONFIGURATION_FILE_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(WebApp webApp)
           throws ServerException
        Description copied from interface: ServerService
        Starts the server, loading the target web app. Calling this method on a non-stopped server should have no effect.
        Specified by:
        start in interface ServerService
        Parameters:
        webApp - The web app to be loaded.
        Throws:
        ServerException - When the server cannot be started (for instance, the address could already be in use).

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws ServerException
        Description copied from interface: ServerService
        Stops a running server. Calling this method on a non-started server should have no effect.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface ServerService
        Throws:
        ServerException - When the server cannot be stopped.

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()
        Specified by:
        isStarted in interface ServerService
        Returns:
        True when the server is running.

      • isStopped

        public boolean isStopped()
        Specified by:
        isStopped in interface ServerService
        Returns:
        False when the server is not running.
